name: Bird Strike for Android
description:
2D side-scrolling arcade game. Use your wits and resources to keep your chopper aloft while avoiding relentless avian enemies.

Left-click or tap the screen to give your chopper lift. Click / tap to the right of the chopper to move it forward in the screen, or to the left of the chopper to move it backward. Use a right-click or swipe to fire missiles.

Collect coins to accumulate gold.
